title: Russia has been engaging with the Taliban for years. The U.S. withdrawal might give it an opportunity to expand its role.
content:
1. Russia has been engaging with the Taliban for years. The U.S. withdrawal might give it an opportunity to expand its role.  CBS News
  2. Afghan crisis: Russia plans for new era with Taliban rule  BBC News
  3. Resistance to Taliban is doomed, says Russian envoy to Afghanistan  Yahoo News
  4. Putin to world: Prevent collapse of Afghanistan – Pajhwok Afghan News  Pajhwok Afghan News
  5. Putin, Erdogan agree to strengthen coordination on Afghan issues -Kremlin  Reuters

localize.title: ロシアは何年も前からタリバンと関わっている。米国の撤退は、その役割を拡大する機会になるかもしれません。
俄罗斯多年来一直在与塔利班接触。美国的撤出可能会给它提供一个扩大其作用的机会。
俄羅斯多年來一直在與塔利班接觸。美國的撤出可能會給它提供一個擴大其作用的機會。
